document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">devoid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">grace, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">hateful, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f084ff">hard, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">successful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">face, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">with </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9064a8">stone </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">feel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thoroughly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">ease </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">old </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">acquaintances </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">First </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a4c4ff">time </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">together </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">thrown. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A face devoid of love or grace
